song.title: Children [Dark Angelus's Instrumental Love Remix]
song.info:
Trackers At Work Proudly Presents A brand new totally toasted Remix
ROBERT MILES 'S CHILDREN Dark Angelus's Instrumental Love Remix --- Comments : This is hard to tell you the feelings i had while composing this remix (which is special), feelings of love, of the old times (that's this song, the original, that reminds me to keep on tracking) and other things too ... ^^
But this track, i put all the stuff i could, all the extra m–πlodies & stuff are MINE & ORIGINAL! Track made on Buzz Tracker, 2days of composition non stop, and i'm kinda proud of it :) --- Especially Dedicated to : My love :) --- Greetings to : - T@W / NZone / CTG / BMTL - Family & Friends - Especially : XeeGee, Ludo B & GS - My Love :) --- Contact : www.trackersatwork.com white_nigga_4_life@hotmail.com --- Please, don't forget the feedback ^^ --- Cya!
Crazy Man aka Dark Angelus / T@W
